import React from 'react' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faPenToSquare } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { faTrash } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' export const Task = ({task, toggleComplete, deleteTodo}) => { return (

toggleComplete(task.id)} >{task.task}

deleteTodo(task.id)} />

) }
